name: Bullet Journaling Template for Notion
description: A fully functional bullet journal-style system you can use with your phone!This bullet journal-inspired template for Notion uses the fundamentals to replicate the analog system as closely as possible but with all the space and convenience of a digital tool!Not sure if you're ready for digital bullet journaling?
